system.availability: A Map that details several planets visited by the mysterious "St. Cognatius", this map gives +30 to Navigation (Warp) Tests to these places, as well as are provided leads, an explorer could follow in seeking the fabled "Tomb of Cognatius".
system.cost: A Star chart with clues to a potential treasure trove known as the "Tomb of Cognatius" Relics are unique, one of a kind items, they must be earned as opposed to acquired.
